mapper.update: INSERT INTO user_level(userId, lootTime, eventTime, unlockDaguan, unlockOrder, lootDaguan, loot_time_normal) VALUES(#{userId}, #{lootTime}, #{eventTime}, #{unlockDaguan}, #{unlockOrder}, #{lootDaguan}, #{lootTimeNormal}) ON duplicate key update lootTime=#{lootTime},eventTime=#{eventTime},unlockDaguan=#{unlockDaguan},unlockOrder=#{unlockOrder},lootDaguan=#{lootDaguan}, loot_time_normal=#{lootTimeNormal}

INSERT INTO user_event(userId, eventorder, eventid, daguan, level, count) VALUES(#{userId}, #{order}, #{eventid}, #{daguan}, #{level}, #{count}) ON duplicate key update eventid=#{eventid},daguan=#{daguan},level=#{level},count=#{count}
mapper.select: DELETE from user_event where userId = #{userId} and eventorder = #{order}
